trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around June 12th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: on the morning og june 11th, under clear sky conditions, at about 9:15 - 9:45 am mdt i saw a formation of ufo s at high altitiude overhead. at first i heard a very loud military jet that caused me to go outside and look. i could not find the jet, and the noise dissipated, but i did see a bunch of odd looking objects in the sky overhead. i counted five in a tight formation, with several others moving around it. i could see the hovering overhead at a high altitude and then start to move east. i got my binoculars and studied them closer for a while. i saw two types of objects: 1) a white, round object that had soemthing dangling underneath it - and it was not a hot air\weather balloon, very different. 2) a fast spinning object with an extremely brilliant white light on either end. it may have been two objects spiinign tightly together. the light was piercing. all fo these objects worked independently of each other, yet were moving as a group from west to east. first hovering overhead for a while, the speeding up towards the east. these ufo s made no sound at all.
